unnormalised: Online transactions are booming, though. UPI touched a record high of 9.6 billion transactions in May 2024. People are using PhonePe and Google Pay for everything – from paying the kirana store ₹50 to splitting dinner bills. Even auto-rickshaw wallahs accept Paytm now!

unnormalised: But, all this digital money comes with risks. Cyber fraud is on the rise. Last month, a friend lost ₹20,000 in an online scam. Always be careful about phishing emails and fake UPI IDs, guys.
